title: Time & Distance â€“ Medium Level
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark.

questions.title: A car travels 150 km in 3 hours. What is its speed?
A man walks at 6 km/h. How much time will he take to cover 15 km?
A train of length 300 m passes a pole in 15 seconds. Its speed is:
A 400 m train passes a 200 m platform in 30 seconds. Find speed.
A boat moves upstream at 8 km/h and downstream at 12 km/h. Speed of stream = ?
Boat speed in still water if upstream = 6 km/h and downstream = 14 km/h.
A person runs at 12 km/h. How long to complete 1.5 km?
Average speed: A car travels 40 km at 20 km/h and 40 km at 40 km/h.
Two people run on a circular track of 300 m at speeds 6 m/s and 4 m/s. When will they meet?
A cyclist travels 18 km at 9 km/h and returns at 6 km/h. Average speed?
If Speed = 54 km/h, time to cover 750 m is:
A bus reduces its speed by 20%. If original speed is 50 km/h, new speed is:
Two cyclists start from same point in opposite directions at 8 km/h and 12 km/h. Distance between them after 1.5 hours?
Train A runs at 40 km/h, Train B at 60 km/h in same direction. Relative speed?
A man runs 10 km at 5 km/h and another 10 km at 10 km/h. Average speed?
